entry.title: Selling ZTE Open unopened & unlocked
entry.content:
Want to buy a ZTE Open? Get this one on ebay

If you are still interested in getting one, just contact me at bertocq@gmail.com and I’ll try to get more from the shop.

The box is unopened, just bought in the shop. It will be delivered with NCK code number for unlocking with your own SIM card when its unboxed. Also shipping Worldwide!!

Box comes with:

4Gb MicroSD card
MicroUSB cable
USB Charger
Earphones
Manual & Warranty (2 years)
Battery
ZTE Open device

https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-nZyXM1Bxxrs/Ue8CPw2YxgI/AAAAAAAAEQ4/H-Bde_MTM2o/s512/P1080244.JPG" width="500" height="500" title="‘’ ‘’" >

Get this one on ebay
